latest_articles.title: Residents of Cortina, a Winter Olympics Hub, Are Angry About All the Construction
latest_articles.summary: In Cortina d’Ampezzo, a hub for the Games in northern Italy, some residents, including a former Olympian, are annoyed about all the construction. Others are annoyed that they’re annoyed.

latest_articles.title: How 2026 Winter Olympics Security Is Preparing For The Opening Ceremony
latest_articles.summary: Thousands of police and security officers will work during the Milan-Cortina Games’ opening ceremony. The involvement of some U.S. ICE personnel has stirred opposition.

latest_articles.title: This is How Hard It Will Be to Get Around Italy’s Winter Olympics
latest_articles.summary: The Games in northern Italy, which start on Friday, will be spread across 8,500 square miles. Long distances, narrow roads, complex connections and snowfall will make it a logistical nightmare.
